SELECT * FROM RESERVATION
rsv_number LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
rsv_name LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
rsv_state LIKE '%'|| #{keyword} ||'%'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RENTAL( ren_number, car_name, rsv_number, rsv_name, rsv_insu, rsv_bannad, rsv_state, car_model_number )SELECT ren_number_seq.nextval, car_name, rsv_number, rsv_name, rsv_insu, rsv_bannad, rsv_state, car_model_number from reservation where rsv_state = '입금완료(인수대기)' and rsv_number = #{rsv_number}
mapper.select: select NVL(sum(price), 0) as rsv_price from (select case when substr(rsv_bannad,1,5) = CONCAT(to_char(sysdate, 'YY'),'/01') then rsv_price end as price from reservation where rsv_state = '반납완료')
select NVL(count(state), 0) from(select case when substr(rsv_bannad,1,5) = CONCAT(to_char(sysdate, 'YY'),'/01') then rsv_state end as state from reservation where rsv_state = '반납완료')
